In `r maxyr`, the Resource Assessment and Conservation Engineering (RACE) Division of the National Marine Fisheries Service’s (NMFS) Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC) conducted the `r str0_srvys`. `r paste0(str0_coverage, str0_stations, str0_temperature, str0_biomass)`This report compares the distribution and relative abundance of `r xunits(length(unique(report_spp1$order[report_spp1$taxon == "fish"])))` fish species and `r xunits(length(unique(report_spp1$order[report_spp1$taxon == "invert"])))` invertebrate taxa with side-by-side maps from the `r compareyr ` and `r maxyr` `r SURVEY` shelf bottom trawl surveys. `r str0_conclusion`
